topics.name: Energy & Cost Savings
topics.description: Reduce energy costs by up to 45% with intelligent automation

hotspots.title: Real-time Energy Usage
hotspots.description: Monitor energy consumption across all properties in real-time. Bodhi AI identifies usage patterns and anomalies automatically.

hotspots.title: Savings Tracker
hotspots.description: Track your actual savings compared to baseline. See ROI metrics and projected annual savings.

hotspots.title: Occupancy-Based Automation
hotspots.description: Automatically adjust climate and lighting based on room occupancy. Bodhi AI learns guest patterns to optimize comfort and efficiency.

hotspots.title: Smart Temperature Scheduling
hotspots.description: Set temperature schedules that automatically adjust based on check-in/check-out times and occupancy.

hotspots.title: Zone Control
hotspots.description: Manage temperature zones across your property from a single view. Group rooms by floor, building, or custom zones.

topics.name: Guest Experience
topics.description: Delight guests with seamless digital experiences

hotspots.title: Mobile Key Access
hotspots.description: Guests unlock their room with their smartphone. No physical keys to manage or replace.

hotspots.title: In-Room Controls
hotspots.description: Guests control lighting, temperature, and shades from their phone. Preferences sync automatically for return visits.

hotspots.title: Service Requests
hotspots.description: One-tap requests for housekeeping, maintenance, or amenities. Requests route automatically to the right team.

hotspots.title: Multi-Property View
hotspots.description: Manage all your properties from one dashboard. Switch between properties or view portfolio-wide metrics.

hotspots.title: Proactive Alerts
hotspots.description: Bodhi AI detects potential issues before they become problems. Get alerts for leaks, temperature anomalies, and equipment issues.

hotspots.title: Ticket Management
hotspots.description: Maintenance tickets auto-generate from alerts. Track status, assign staff, and monitor resolution times.

hotspots.title: Leak & Flood Detection
hotspots.description: Sensors detect water issues immediately. Automatic alerts prevent costly damage.

hotspots.title: Predictive Maintenance
hotspots.description: Bodhi AI analyzes equipment patterns to predict failures before they happen. Schedule maintenance proactively.

hotspots.title: Device Inventory
hotspots.description: View and manage all connected devices. Monitor battery levels, connectivity status, and firmware versions.

hotspots.title: Remote Configuration
hotspots.description: Update device settings remotely. Push firmware updates across your entire portfolio at once.

hotspots.title: PMS Integration
hotspots.description: Connects with Opera, Mews, and other property management systems. Guest data syncs automatically.

hotspots.title: API Access
hotspots.description: Full REST API for custom integrations. Connect Bodhi to your existing tech stack.
